comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: Good initiative op.Â Â  Â  Â  Â  I want make una follow me celebrate my daughters birthdayToday nah my daughter birthday and her name nah Mercy-T (Mercy Treasure) and nah today go make her 1 year for this world way she come, I hope say if some forum members go fit attend her birthday party today for bayelsa state Igbogene by 4:30pm nai the party dey start.Letter today I go upload the photos of here birthday party so that everyone go help me wish her well and also make una ready her birthday gifts oooo .

comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on September 24, 2023, 07:38:28 AMA NEW BABY IS BORN INTO MY FAMILY, JOIN ME IN THE CELEBRATION.So yesterday was a really big day for me and my father, if some of you guys noticed, I wasn't really active on the forum yesterday, it was for the fact that I was in the hospital as early as 1am Saturday morning, the devil showed up, did all he could to see that I morn rather than celebrate, but God showed up and gave me victory at the end, so I am here today thanking God, and calling on you guys to join me in thanking God and also in the celebration..My wife went through c-session to deliver off this child, I am happy for she came out alive and our baby alive, aside from the c-session pain my wife is still going through, both of them are strong ğŸ’ª, I am so happy.And again, my other happiness is for the fact that - I don hang boot ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚, the way our dear country is going, does not require one having too many children, only born as many you know you fit give proper training..I have three beautiful daughters already and that is enough for me, my wife said to me, "but we are yet to have a boy", and I said to her, "boy or no boy "I am don having children".I will make sure this ones get the best of parental training, get the best of education, get the best of everything I can afford to give them a really good life.Join me celebrate guys, I am so so happy ğŸ˜Š ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ’ƒğŸ’ƒğŸ’ƒğŸ’ƒ. I say make na me be the first person to wish you big congratulations from the forum.Best wishes to your new baby and thanks be to God for his good works in your family and never let you to shame.Congratulations my boss, if at all we go drink enough wine today birthday plus new baby in the house of @Fivestar4everMVP.ONES AGAIN CONGRATULATIONS TO YOU.
